formalpara.title: Figure 22. Jean Brun next to a highly precise temperature incubator for C. elegans cultures
formalpara.para: (PhD defense, 1966). The temperature-control system on the left was usually further placed in a temperature-controlled incubator with cooling, at a temperature of 22°C. Note the drawing of the C. elegans hermaphrodite gonad and meiosis on the blackboard. Courtesy of Mrs. G. Brun.
